name: Triple Fix Blurring and Hydrating Skin Tint Foundation Stick
about: What it is:u00a0An ingredient-rich skin tint stick enhances complexion to help visibly even skin, while concealing the look of any blemishes or uneven tone with just one swipe...Coverage:u00a0Medium.Finish:u00a0Natural.Formulation:u00a0Stick.Highlighted Ingredients:u00a0- Green Tea Extract: Soothes and hydrates skin while reducing redness..- Watermelon Seed Extract: Retains skinu2019s moisture levels for a healthy, radiant look..- Rosehip Oil: Is an antioxidant-rich ingredient with vitamins A, C, and E that visibly reduces dark spots and improves moisture levels...Ingredient Callouts: This product is vegan and cruelty-free...What Else You Need to Know: An all-in-one serum, primer, and skin tint, this pigmented blurring stick instantly wipes away the look of breakthrough texture and enlarged pores while providing a veil of coverage with a natural, skin-like finish. Its lightweight, easy-to-blend formula gives you lasting hydration with a glow...Clean.Clean at Sephora is our commitment to offering formulas that go beyond regulatory standards to avoid controversial ingredients without sacrificingu00a0effectiveness.
ingredients: -Green Tea Extract: Soothes and hydrates skin while reducing redness..-Watermelon Seed Extract: Retains skinu2019s moisture levels for a healthy, radiant look..-Rosehip Oil: Is an antioxidant-rich ingredient with vitamins A, C, and E that visibly reduces dark spots and improves moisture levels...Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Isononyl Isononanoate, Diisostearyl Malate, Synthetic Wax, Ceresin, Polyisobutene, Aluminum Hydroxide, Sodium Hyaluronate, Camellia Sinensis (Green Tea) Leaf Extract, Carthamus Tinctorius (Safflower) Seed Oil, Citrullus Lanatus (Watermelon) Fruit Extract, Tocopheryl Acetate (Vitamin E), Rosa Rubiginosa (Rosehip) Seed Oil, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Glucomannan, Silica, Trihydroxystearin, Phenoxyethanol. May Contain [+/-]: Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499), Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891)...The list of ingredients is subject to change. Please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Swipe stick generously across your forehead, cheeks, and chin, then gently blend with your fingertips like you would with a serum..-For additional coverage, apply with a makeup sponge or brush (not included), then buff using circular motions. .-Layer and build until you achieve your desired look. .-Blend into your neck and ears for a seamless, undetectable finish.

reviews.review_title: blends like a dream, buildable coverage, easy.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Saw this baddie on TikTok and wanted to switch my routine up a bit and give this brand a try. I don't really wear foundation so a lightweight skin tint is more my speed and I was intrigued.  Packaging was great but shade range is pretty limited (I wound up going with MN3 which I thought might be a bit too light for me tbh). However, I gotta say that because it blends so effortlessly into the skin, the shade worked overall pretty well for my complexion! This color corrected majority of my redness with even just a few swipes - im taking one swipe on the forehead, one on each cheek - but didn't feel heavy at all. Freckles still came through a bit, which is exactly what I was looking for.  Felt like you could easily build up more coverage if that's what you're looking for.  I used a brush on one half of my face and my fingers for the other side and both looked great so I feel like this would be a great travel buddy or I have 5 minutes to get my face in line companion.  My only slight issue was that I did get some patchiness in between my brows but I get that with nearly every product I use because I tend to get quite dry around there - but nothing major and was able to mostly fix that with a bit of extra blending and a setting spray.  Took a star off for that & the limited shade range - but will definitely be going back to this product and this brand often.

reviews.review_title: Not the best for dry or combo skin, but I like it.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Let me start with the positives - I like it for the coverage and application for sure. The shape of the stick is great for application purposes, and the shade match is *perfect*. I'll definitely keep using it for those reasons. However, I really don't recommend this to anyone with dry skin, and it might not work to great for some with combination skin either. The formula of this stick feels drying on the skin, especially for long wear throughout the day, and it really makes some of my dry spots on my face stand out. When I bought this, the lady who sold it to me at my Sephora recommended I use a LOT of setting spray when I apply it, I didn't understand it at first until I tried to wear it for a full day and it seriously settled onto my dry skin and into my skin texture. The next time I used it, I made sure to moisturize just before applying it, and set it with extra setting spray after - and it wore pretty well for a full day, accept for one dry spot on my nose. So I might even recommend, make sure you keep your skin well exfoliated when you're planning to use this, because it loves skin texture or dryness.

It has light to medium adjustable coverage and a satin finish and does need to be powdered if you are oily. Dry skin girlies will love the finish and feel. Plus, can we all agree on the amazing price point?!  Overall, this is another great product from Lys!

reviews.review_title: LYS Beauty Has Changed the Game!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This triple threat is an all-in-one serum, primer, and foundation. Trust me when I say that I was hesitant to believe in the three layers working together on my skin. Girl, I was wrong! It's not cakey, it's not sticky, and it's everything I've ever wanted in a foundation. Your girl has had a rough summer with makeup and it's been such a struggle to find a shade that matches as well as staying on my skin. This changes EVERYTHING. I was shocked at the quality of the shade match for me and how well it stayed on my skin. The coverage all depends on you so on the days when I want to embrace my natural beauty, I can keep it sheer. Then on the days when I want to express myself with my makeup and I need the full-coverage, I can use this foundation, too! I'm so blessed to have been able to try this product and it's my new holy grail. Try this one out, today, so you can have your skin, your way, and in your own time!

reviews.review_text: Here's another great review for I'm thrilled to have found my perfect match with the LYS Beauty Triple Fix Skin Tint Foundation Stick in LN6! If you're looking for a clean, effective, and easy-to-use product that gives you a healthy, glowing complexion, look no further! The LYS Beauty Triple Fix Skin Tint Foundation Stick is a must-try.
